Isabella Rodriguez.description: still working at the counter, taking orders and chatting with customers @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about discussing gentrification and its impacts on marginalized communities, exchanging ideas on incorporating case studies into Klaus' paper, and planning to continue their conversation over coffee at Hobbs Cafe @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how's your paper going? Need any help?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria! It's going well, just trying to finish up a few more sections. Any insights on gentrification you think I should include?
Maria Lopez
I think discussing the impact of gentrification on marginalized communities could be a valuable addition to your paper. Have you looked into any case studies?
Klaus Mueller
That's a great idea, Maria. I'll definitely look into incorporating case studies on the impact of gentrification on marginalized communities. Thanks for the suggestion!
Maria Lopez
Let me know if you need any help with finding resources for your paper on gentrification.
Klaus Mueller
Thanks, Maria. I appreciate your offer. I'll definitely let you know if I need help with finding resources for my paper on gentrification.
Maria Lopez
Do you want to grab a coffee and discuss more about gentrification and its impacts on marginalized communities?
Klaus Mueller
That sounds like a great idea, Maria. Let's head over to Hobbs Cafe and continue our conversation.
Maria Lopez
Let's grab our stuff and head over to Hobbs Cafe.
Klaus Mueller
Let's grab our stuff and head over to Hobbs Cafe.
Maria Lopez
Let's head to Hobbs Cafe and dive deeper into the topic of gentrification.
Klaus Mueller
I'm really looking forward to discussing this further over some coffee, Maria.
Maria Lopez
Let's go to Hobbs Cafe and dive deeper into the topic of gentrification.
Klaus Mueller
Let's go grab a table at Hobbs Cafe and continue our discussion.
Maria Lopez
Let's order some coffee and start brainstorming on how we can incorporate those case studies into your paper.
Klaus Mueller
Thanks, Maria. I'm excited to dive deeper into this topic with you over some coffee at Hobbs Cafe.
